hooks.command: echo 'Check if any of the available skills in the global CLAUDE.md can help complete the task more effectively. Skills provide specialized capabilities and domain knowledge.'

jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | while read file_path; do if [[ -f "$file_path" ]]; then dir=$(dirname "$file_path"); biome_config=""; while [[ "$dir" != "/" ]] && [[ -z "$biome_config" ]]; do if [[ -f "$dir/biome.json" ]] || [[ -f "$dir/biome.jsonc" ]] || [[ -f "$dir/.biome.json" ]]; then biome_config="$dir"; fi; dir=$(dirname "$dir"); done; if [[ "$file_path" == *.sol ]]; then if command -v forge >/dev/null 2>&1; then forge fmt "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; else if [[ -n "$biome_config" ]] && command -v ultracite >/dev/null 2>&1; then ultracite fix "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; bunx prettier --write "$file_path" --ignore-unknown 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi; done
